toughbook.title: TOUGHBOOK
toughbook.intro: Your work in education is extraordinary, as you encourage and grow the next generation of leaders. So the devices you use need to match your extraordinary work step for step. That’s why we build pioneering rugged laptops and 2-in-1's trusted by hardworking students and educators alike.

content.name: Product
content.title: TOUGHBOOK 55
content.intro: For the heavy traffic, all-day use that education demands, there’s no better solution than the TOUGHBOOK range of hardwearing tech. And the TOUGHBOOK 55 notebook is no exception.
list: Lightweight yet robust hardware that stands the test of time, along with knocks, drops and spills
Featuring Windows 10 Pro – for the most secure Windows device on the market
Extended battery life – up to 20 hours – plus warm and hot-swap battery options
Superior screen readability in all conditions – perfect for darkened auditoriums or under bright lights

content.name: Case study
content.title: See TOUGHBOOK in action
content.intro: Don’t just take our word for it. We have hundreds of case studies demonstrating just how far our TOUGHBOOK range of notebooks, tablets and handheld devices can take you.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Quality assurance, guaranteed
content.intro:
The ultimate user experience is never a one-off moment for TOUGHBOOK. It takes exceptional service, from the moment you start talking to us about your requirements, right on throughout the lifetime of your devices.

Our TOUGHBOOK European Configuration and Service centre has a critical role to play, as the home to our solutions engineering team, prototyping and testing facilities, and our service technicians, ready to ensure your device is made and maintained to your specifications.

projector.title: Auditorium projectors
projector.intro: No one offers a wider range of laser-illuminated projectors than Panasonic. We manufacture some of the lightest, brightest, technologically advanced, and reliable large-venue video projectors on the market.

content.name: Product
content.title: Large venue projector
content.intro: With unrivalled image visibility and superior colour production, our projectors are ready to help you inspire students’ creativity.
list: Crystal-clear image quality – 10,000 lumens and 4K quality
Rich Colour Harmonizer technology delivers superbly accurate colour reproduction
Crisp, smooth, and richly detailed 4K (3840 x 2160, 16:9) images
Up to 20,000 hours maintenance-free operation with dust-resistant optical block and long-lasting laser engine

content.name: Case study
content.title: A tech blueprint for the future of higher education
content.intro: When a Swedish University wanted to build a new campus that would be the best place to study and work, it turned to Panasonic for its varied projector and camera requirements.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Solid shine laser technology
content.intro: Discover a whole new level of visual experiences. Our laser projectors are designed so that big, bright, colourful images can be enjoyed, experienced and remembered – while you can forget all about maintenance.
list: Over 20,000 hours maintenance-free lifespan
A more eco-friendly solution, with instant on/off technology and lower temperature operation
Dust-resistance optical parts and filter-free design

content.name: Whitepaper
content.title: Laser projection for higher education
content.intro: We evaluated the performance of one of our laser projectors, the RZ670 with a rating of 6,500 lm, against a range of the higher education industry’s best-selling lamp-lit projectors, to see which offered the best financial and environmental prospects.

screen.title: Professional Displays
screen.intro: Panasonic Visual Solutions has been relentlessly perfecting technologies that free you and your students to create the ultimate visual experiences. As the world moves to 4K, we’re keeping you one step ahead – combining bright, crisp 4K resolution with the ultra-reliable qualities and expandability you’ve come to expect from our LED display technology.

content.name: Product
content.title: Professional LED Displays + Repeater Displays
content.intro: For a quality display even in low lights, our advanced LED displays offer bright, crisp 4K resolution with the ultra-reliable qualities and expandability you expect from Panasonic.
list: 4K LED technology, for unrivalled visibility in all lighting conditions
Built for heavy duty use with high impact resistance and 24/7 operation capability
Featuring DIGITAL LINK technology: our screens allow the transmission of high-quality video, audio and control signals across distances of up to 150m

content.name: Case study
content.title: Capturing the attention of Germany’s future leaders
content.intro: Otto Beisheim School of Management in Dusseldorf needed to create a connected learning environment to meet the needs of remote and foreign students, alike. As a result, we implemented a Panopto lecture capture system alongside video conferencing and Panasonic AV to create a flexible teaching space.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Your questions, answered
content.intro: At Panasonic, your journey with us doesn’t stop when you have our products in your hands. We have a range of ‘How To’ guides and step-by-step tutorials to help you get to grips with our products.

touch.title: Multi-touch Professional Displays
touch.intro: When it comes to collaboration, Panasonic’s multi-touch professional displays have been designed for free, flexible and intuitive working. With robust touchscreens that are built for the all-day, always-on education environments, they’re able to handle heavy use without compromising on quality.

content.name: Product
content.title: Multi-touch Professional LED Displays
content.intro: Our multi-touch professional LED displays bring smarter, faster solutions to tutors and students who want to interact with their visual technology.
list: Featuring accessible and intuitive whiteboard technology
Available with a choice of touchscreen sizes ranging from 42” to 80”
Ideal for collaborative learning and the Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) trend
Bring practical functions to collaboration and learning, such as PowerPoint presentation mode, video and screen capture and desktop mode

content.name: Case study
content.title: Introducing the arrival of interactive 4K
content.intro: Now, you can experience Panasonic’s interactive multi-touch technology with professional 4K quality displays when you choose models from the SQE1 and CQE1 Series.</br></br>Guaranteed to deliver an excellent viewing experience from any position in your lecture rooms, classrooms and auditoriums with 4K resolution and 400 cd/m2 brightness, our range has been engineered for everyday use, boasting a 16-hour continuous operation capability for superb reliability and value for money. The range is also equipped with a variety of connectivity options, making it versatile and ready for your learning environment.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Multi-touch display: Which technology is right for you?
content.intro: To ensure we are covering all your institutions’ needs, Panasonic delivers different technologies embedded in our professional multi-touch screen displays.</br></br>Our interactive screens with whiteboard functionality can be used for collaboration and Bring your own device (BYOD) environments from classrooms, to seminar rooms, to lecture theatres and presentation rooms.</br></br>Our guide will help you find the right product.

control.intro: No one offers a wider range of laser-illuminated projectors than Panasonic. We manufacture some of the lightest, brightest, technologically advanced, and reliable large-venue video projectors on the market.

ptz.title: Professional Cameras
ptz.intro: For your auditoriums and larger lecture theatres, we have a range of AV technologies, remote control cameras, projectors and screens which offer pristine image quality and excellent sound reproduction. Your lecturers and tutors are supported by tech that’s robust and reliable, with simple functionality that means they can focus on what really matters.

content.name: Product
content.title: Panasonic PTZ Cameras
content.intro: Our integrated PTZ remote camera systems have been engineered to support the future of e-learning.
list: Capture lectures in real-time over IP, or record sessions for later with superior sound and image quality
Superior Ultra-HD 4K image quality, with the ability to support HD and SD formats where needed
Auto-tracking software so Lecturers can move freely around the auditorium

content.name: Case study
content.title: Simple streaming at the Royal Academy of Music
content.intro: Through the installation of five AW-HE130 remote cameras into the Royal Academy’s flagship 400-seat concert venue, the team can record, livestream and broadcast performances – so remote students never miss a beat.

content.title: Your guide to Panasonic PTZ
content.intro: At Panasonic, your journey with us doesn’t stop when you have our products in your hands. We have a range of ‘How To’ guides and step-by-step tutorials to help you get to grips with our products.
